      • getLayoutDataOfControls

        public java.lang.Object[] getLayoutDataOfControls()
        Description copied from interface: IEditorLookAndBehaviour
        Provides an array of layout data in the form that the first cell contains the layout data for all controls. Each further array cell n set the layout for the corresponding control in the grid cell n.
        Specified by:
        getLayoutDataOfControls in interface IEditorLookAndBehaviour
        Returns:
        a field of layout data objects with an asserted minimum length of 1.

      • getShowValidationInProgressMessageDelay

        public long getShowValidationInProgressMessageDelay()
        Specified by:
        getShowValidationInProgressMessageDelay in interface IValidatingEditorLookAndBehaviour
        Returns:
        Milliseconds the corresponding validation hint to a running validation process should be delayed. This value is related as well as IValidatingEditorLookAndBehaviour.getStartValidationDelay() to the moment of input modification.
